alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SULLIVAN AND CENTRAL PIKE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blooming Grove, or 15 miles southeast of Honesdale, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lackawaxen, Blooming Grove, Paupack, Shohola, Eldred, Greeley, Twin Lakes, Barryville, Rowland, and Lords Valley. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 84 between 26 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
